MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH7 postcode area of Mold. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:44am. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on 27th December 2020.
